channel.title: Need client sided help
channel.description: So let me say it now, I'm not a leecher, so please don't refrain from helping me because you think I'm going to change the name of everything and run the server. I stopped RSPS for awhile about 2 years ago, and I forgot how to rename the title of the client, I thought it was in Frame_Sub1.java but apparently not. Also, in what file, pretty sure its client.java, and what phrase do I search to change the IP the client connects to? Thanks :)

item.title: Need client sided help
item.dc:creator: @Imnotokkk Imnotokkk
item.description:
@Imnotokkk wrote:

Thank you, rep++ for you.

Read full topic

item.title: Need client sided help
item.dc:creator: @wboar wboar
item.description:
@wboar wrote:

To change a client title search this in Gui.java:

public static String frameTitle =

To change a ip search this in same file (Gui.java):

Serverip =

Read full topic
